title: Cactus armor
summaries: Cactus armor is an early-game set of armor which can be crafted with 75 Cactus.

On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, its set bonus grants an extra 1 defense. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, it instead provides a thorns effect, dealing 15 / <abbr class="expert" title="Expert Mode">30</abbr> / <abbr class="master" title="Master Mode">45</abbr> damage and inflicting a knockback of 10 (Extremely strong) on enemies that come into contact with the wearer.

statistics.Set Bonus: Attackers take damage from the cactus spines
statistics.Sell: 150 (set)
